,

marriage


Betwixt

,

off
,


Partly
 
for

honor

my
 
dread
 
lord
,


I
 
should
 
be
 
guiltier
 
than
 
my
 
guiltiness


To
 
think
 
I
 
can
 
be
 
undiscernible
,


When
 
I
 
perceive
 
your
 
Grace
,
 
like
 
power
 
divine
,


Hath
 
looked
 
upon
 
my
 
passes
.

,
 
good
 
prince
,


No
 
longer
 
session
 
hold
 
upon
 
my
 
shame
,


But
 
let
 
my
 
trial
 
be
 
mine
 
own
 
confession
.


Immediate
 
sentence
 
then
 
and
 
sequent
 
death


Is
 
all
 
the
 
grace
 
I
 
beg
.
